Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-52565 affecting package moby-runc for versions less than 1.2.8-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-52565 affecting package moby-runc for versions less than 1.2.8-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-runc is earlier than 1.2.8-1, affected by CVE-2025-52565
